video_prompt: Giant red robot actively interacts with a burning bus on a winding mountain road. Electricity arcs from the robot while flames engulf the bus. A powerful storm rages, with active funnel clouds and lightning tearing through the dark sky. Heavy rain streaks the scene, enhancing the chaotic and perilous movements.
image_prompt: Giant red robot attacks burning bus on a stormy mountain road. Intense and chaotic, featuring lightning, a funnel cloud, and heavy rain.
refined_video_prompt: A giant red robot actively manipulates a burning bus, with electricity arcing dynamically from its movements. Flames aggressively engulf the bus, visibly spreading and consuming it. A powerful storm rages overhead, as active funnel clouds churn intensely and lightning dramatically tears across the dark sky. Heavy rain continuously streaks the entire scene, accentuating the chaotic and perilous movements.
